Cisco  / April 2015 – August 2017
I was assigned to the TATA Account team (which is part of Global 
Enterprise Segment that is responsible for Cisco ’s top 29 Clients). 
My role was primarily customer focused and my responsibilities 
were shaped by the need to identify and respond to the customer ’s 
individual requirements. Thus, I am experienced in:
▪ Leading multiple $1M+  deals from a technical perceptive
▪ Leading several Proof of Concept labs
▪ Presenting to senior executives and customers
▪ Gathering technical & business requirements 
▪ Creating solutions 
▪ Formulating and validating Bill of Materials
▪ Creating reference architectures
▪ Producing High Level Designs
▪ Managing internal resources to counteract competitor threats
▪ Supporting TAC resources to address network issues
▪ Organising cyber threat clinics for customers and internal staff
▪ Mentoring colleagues who are new to CiscoP R O F I L E
I’m extremely passionate about technology and how it can shape our 
modern world. In particular, I have an avid interest in Security & 
Wireless; given that the world we live in is demanding increasingly 
secure and mobile solutions.
I’m highly customer focused and believe in building rapport through 
an in -depth understanding of my customer ’s needs and their 
business goals. Through my current role in sales, I have gained a 
wealth of experience in developing effective customer relationships 
and creative problem solving approaches.

Currently I am aligned to the sector that focuses on automotive, 
transportation, utilities and manufacturing.  
My responsibilities include:
▪ Presenting/creating solutions
▪ Leading PoCs
▪ Developing relationships with partner community
▪ Gathering technical & business requirements 
▪ Working with other technology vendors to formalise a solution 
that integrates
▪ Providing cyber security risk analysis
▪ Optimizing solutions that customers have currently invested in
▪ Delivering training workshops for customers 
▪ Presenting at Tradeshows
▪ Managing resources from other parts of the business to deliver 
support as well as technical assistance to the customer
Core Skills Alexander Duncan MSc
Main role was to support Field Engineers and Account Managers by 
providing support from across a range of areas; including technical 
support and validating network designs. This involved specialising in 
network security, with a particular focus on Cisco ’s ISE (Identity Service 
Engine).
Responsibilities included:
▪ RFPs
▪ Assisting Field Engineers and Account Managers 
▪ Devising and delivering technical presentations
▪ Technical product research 
▪ Budgetary accounting
▪ Validation of technical solutions
▪ Ensuring customer satisfaction
▪ Working with Field Engineers to create preliminary network 
designs
▪ Customer engagements
▪ Network configuration in laboratory  
▪ Mentoring colleaguesVirtual Systems Engineer - Security
